Description: Ostracon, large fragment of the body of a brown pottery ribbed vessel, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and very faint traces of a number of lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394857) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394857)
